title: Reward Claimed: GTA$100,000
headline: Reward Claimed: GTA$100,000
subtitle: For Completing Taxi Work
content:
Your GTA$100,000 Reward for completing Taxi Work between January 26 and February 8 has been deposited into your Maze Bank Account.

Stay tuned to the Rockstar Newswire for more limited-time events coming soon.
